content_old: 20 Of the sons of Ephraim Hoshea son of Azaziah. Of the half tribe of Manasseh Joel､ son of Pedaiah.

content: 21 Of the half of Manasseh､ in Gilead Iddo､ son of Zechariah. Of Benjamin Jaasiel､ son of Abner.
content_old: 21 Of the half of Manasseh､ in Gilead Iddo､ son of Zechariah. Of Benjamin Jaasiel､ son of Abner.

content: 22 Of Dan Azarel､ son of Jeroham. These were the rulers of the tribes of Israel.
content_old: 22 Of Dan Azarel､ son of Jeroham. These were the rulers of the tribes of Israel.

content: 23 But David took not the number of them, from twenty years old､ and under,—because Yahweh had said, he would multiply Israel like the stars of the heavens.
content_old: 23 But David took not the number of them, from twenty years old､ and under,—because Yahweh had said, he would multiply Israel like the stars of the heavens.

content: 24 Joab son of Zeruiah began to number､ but finished not, when there arose､ on this account､ indignation against Israel,—neither did the number come up into the account of the chronicles of King David.
content_old: 24 Joab son of Zeruiah began to number､ but finished not, when there arose､ on this account､ indignation against Israel,—neither did the number come up into the account of the chronicles of King David.

content: 25 And over the treasuries of the king was Azmaveth､ son of Adiel. And over the treasuries in the fields､ in the cities､ in the villages and in the castles was Jonathan､ son of Uzziah;
content_old: 25 And over the treasuries of the king was Azmaveth､ son of Adiel. And over the treasuries in the fields､ in the cities､ in the villages and in the castles was Jonathan､ son of Uzziah;

content: 26 And over the workers of the field, for the tillage of the ground was Ezri､ son of Chelub.
content_old: 26 And over the workers of the field, for the tillage of the ground was Ezri､ son of Chelub.

content: 27 And over the vineyards was Shimei､ the Ramathite. And over that which was in the vineyards､ for the treasuries of wine was Zabdi､ the Shiphmite.
content_old: 27 And over the vineyards was Shimei､ the Ramathite. And over that which was in the vineyards､ for the treasuries of wine was Zabdi､ the Shiphmite.

content: 28 And over the olive-trees and the sycamore-trees that were in the lowland was Baal-hanan the Gederite. And over the treasuries of oil was Joash.
content_old: 28 And over the olive-trees and the sycamore-trees that were in the lowland was Baal-hanan the Gederite. And over the treasuries of oil was Joash.

content: 29 And over the herds that pastured in Sharon was Shitrai､ the Sharonite. And over the herds in the vales Shaphat､ son of Adlai.
content_old: 29 And over the herds that pastured in Sharon was Shitrai､ the Sharonite. And over the herds in the vales Shaphat､ son of Adlai.

content: 30 And over the camels was Obil､ the Ishmaelite. And over the asses was Jehdeyahu the Meronothite.
content_old: 30 And over the camels was Obil､ the Ishmaelite. And over the asses was Jehdeyahu the Meronothite.

content: 31 And over the flocks was Jaziz､ the Hagrite. All these were rulers over the possessions that belonged to King David.
content_old: 31 And over the flocks was Jaziz､ the Hagrite. All these were rulers over the possessions that belonged to King David.

content: 32 And Jonathan the relative of David was a counsellor, a man of understanding and a scribe was he. And Jehiel son of Hachmoni was with the sons of the king.
content_old: 32 And Jonathan the relative of David was a counsellor, a man of understanding and a scribe was he. And Jehiel son of Hachmoni was with the sons of the king.

content: 33 And Ahitophel was counsellor to the king. And Hushai the Archite was the companion of the king.
content_old: 33 And Ahitophel was counsellor to the king. And Hushai the Archite was the companion of the king.

content: 1 And David called together all the rulers of Israel､ the rulers of tribes and the rulers of the courses who waited upon the king,—and the rulers of thousands and the rulers of hundreds､ and the rulers over all the possessions and substance that belonged to the king and to his sons, with the courtiers and the heroes､ even every hero of valour, unto Jerusalem.
content_old: 1 And David called together all the rulers of Israel､ the rulers of tribes and the rulers of the courses who waited upon the king,—and the rulers of thousands and the rulers of hundreds､ and the rulers over all the possessions and substance that belonged to the king and to his sons, with the courtiers and the heroes､ even every hero of valour, unto Jerusalem.

content: 2 Then David the king rose up on his feet, and said､ Hear me､ my brethren and my people,— As for me it was near my heart､ to build a house of rest for the ark of the covenant of Yahweh､ and for the footstool of our God, and I made ready to build.
content_old: 2 Then David the king rose up on his feet, and said､ Hear me､ my brethren and my people,— As for me it was near my heart､ to build a house of rest for the ark of the covenant of Yahweh､ and for the footstool of our God, and I made ready to build.

content: 3 But God said to me, Thou shalt not build a house for my Name,—for a man of war thou art､` and blood hast thou shed.
content_old: 3 But God said to me, Thou shalt not build a house for my Name,—for a man of war thou art､` and blood hast thou shed.

content: 4 Howbeit Yahweh､ God of Israel､ made choice of me､ out of all of the house of my father､ to become king over Israel unto times age-abiding, for of Judah had he made choice to be chief ruler, and in the house of Judah the house of my father,—and among the sons of my father with me was he well-pleased, to make me king over all Israel;
content_old: 4 Howbeit Yahweh､ God of Israel､ made choice of me､ out of all of the house of my father､ to become king over Israel unto times age-abiding, for of Judah had he made choice to be chief ruler, and in the house of Judah the house of my father,—and among the sons of my father with me was he well-pleased, to make me king over all Israel;

content: 5 and from among all my sons—for many sons hath Yahweh given me,—he hath made choice of Solomon my son, to sit upon the throne of the kingdom of Yahweh､ over Israel.
content_old: 5 and from among all my sons—for many sons hath Yahweh given me,—he hath made choice of Solomon my son, to sit upon the throne of the kingdom of Yahweh､ over Israel.

content: 6 And he said unto me, Solomon thy son—he shall build my house､ and my courts,—for I have made choice of him that he may be my son, and that I may be his father.
content_old: 6 And he said unto me, Solomon thy son—he shall build my house､ and my courts,—for I have made choice of him that he may be my son, and that I may be his father.

content: 7 So will I establish his kingdom､ unto times age-abiding,—if he be strong､ to do my commandments and my regulations､ as at this day.
content_old: 7 So will I establish his kingdom､ unto times age-abiding,—if he be strong､ to do my commandments and my regulations､ as at this day.

content: 8 Now therefore､ in the eyes of all Israel—the convocation of Yahweh､ and in the ears of our God Observe and seek all the commandments of Yahweh your God,—to the end that ye may possess the good land,—and suffer your sons after you to inherit it､ unto times age-abiding.
content_old: 8 Now therefore､ in the eyes of all Israel—the convocation of Yahweh､ and in the ears of our God Observe and seek all the commandments of Yahweh your God,—to the end that ye may possess the good land,—and suffer your sons after you to inherit it､ unto times age-abiding.

content: 9 Thou､ therefore､ Solomon my son Know thou the God of thy father､ And serve him with a perfect heart and with a willing soul, For all hearts doth Yahweh search, And every devised purpose doth he understand,— If thou seek him He will be found of thee, But if thou forsake him He will cast thee off for ever.
content_old: 9 Thou､ therefore､ Solomon my son Know thou the God of thy father､ And serve him with a perfect heart and with a willing soul, For all hearts doth Yahweh search, And every devised purpose doth he understand,— If thou seek him He will be found of thee, But if thou forsake him He will cast thee off for ever.

content: 10 See! now that Yahweh hath made choice of thee､ to build a house for a sanctuary—be strong and do!
content_old: 10 See! now that Yahweh hath made choice of thee､ to build a house for a sanctuary—be strong and do!

content: 11 Then gave David unto Solomon his son､ the plan of the porch, and the recesses thereof, and the treasuries thereof, and the upper rooms thereof､ and the inner chambers thereof､ and the recess for the propitiatory;
content_old: 11 Then gave David unto Solomon his son､ the plan of the porch, and the recesses thereof, and the treasuries thereof, and the upper rooms thereof､ and the inner chambers thereof､ and the recess for the propitiatory;

content: 12 and the plan of all which had come by the spirit to be with him, for the courts of the house of Yahweh､ and for all the rooms round about,—for the treasuries of the house of God, and for the treasuries of hallowed things;
content_old: 12 and the plan of all which had come by the spirit to be with him, for the courts of the house of Yahweh､ and for all the rooms round about,—for the treasuries of the house of God, and for the treasuries of hallowed things;

content: 13 and for the courses of the priests and the Levites, and for all the work of the service of the house of Yahweh,—and for all the utensils of the service of the house of Yahweh:
content_old: 13 and for the courses of the priests and the Levites, and for all the work of the service of the house of Yahweh,—and for all the utensils of the service of the house of Yahweh:

content: 14 of gold､ by weight for the gold, for all manner of utensils for each several service,—for all manner of utensils of silver､ by weight, for all manner of utensils for each several service;
content_old: 14 of gold､ by weight for the gold, for all manner of utensils for each several service,—for all manner of utensils of silver､ by weight, for all manner of utensils for each several service;

content: 15 and a weight､ for the lamp-stands of gold､ and their lamps of gold, by the weight of each several lampstand､ and the lamps thereof,—and for the lampstands of silver by weight､ for each lampstand and the lamps thereof, according to the service of each several lampstand.
content_old: 15 and a weight､ for the lamp-stands of gold､ and their lamps of gold, by the weight of each several lampstand､ and the lamps thereof,—and for the lampstands of silver by weight､ for each lampstand and the lamps thereof, according to the service of each several lampstand.

content: 16 And the gold gave he by weight for the tables for setting in array､ for each several table,—and silver､ for the tables of silver;
content_old: 16 And the gold gave he by weight for the tables for setting in array､ for each several table,—and silver､ for the tables of silver;

content: 17 and the fleshhooks and the bowls and the cups､ pure gold,—and for the goblets of gold､ by weight for each several goblet, and for the goblets of silver､ by weight for each several goblet;
content_old: 17 and the fleshhooks and the bowls and the cups､ pure gold,—and for the goblets of gold､ by weight for each several goblet, and for the goblets of silver､ by weight for each several goblet;

content: 18 and for the altar of incense refined gold､ by weight,—and for the pattern of the chariot of the cherubim gold､ for them that were spreading out, and covering the ark of the covenant of Yahweh:—
content_old: 18 and for the altar of incense refined gold､ by weight,—and for the pattern of the chariot of the cherubim gold､ for them that were spreading out, and covering the ark of the covenant of Yahweh:—

content: 19 the whole in writing､ From the hand of Yahweh upon me to give understanding,— all the works of the pattern.
content_old: 19 the whole in writing､ From the hand of Yahweh upon me to give understanding,— all the works of the pattern.

content: 20 Then said David､ unto Solomon his son､ Be strong and bold､ and act, thou mayest not fear nor be dismayed,—for Yahweh､ God､ my God will be with thee, he will not let thee go､ neither will he forsake thee, until thou hast finished all the work of the service of the house of Yahweh.
content_old: 20 Then said David､ unto Solomon his son､ Be strong and bold､ and act, thou mayest not fear nor be dismayed,—for Yahweh､ God､ my God will be with thee, he will not let thee go､ neither will he forsake thee, until thou hast finished all the work of the service of the house of Yahweh.

content: 1 Then said David the king unto all the convocation, Solomon my son､the one of whom God hath made choice is young and tender,—and the work is great, seeing that not for man is the palace, but for Yahweh Elohim.
content_old: 1 Then said David the king unto all the convocation, Solomon my son､the one of whom God hath made choice is young and tender,—and the work is great, seeing that not for man is the palace, but for Yahweh Elohim.

content: 2 And with all my might have I made preparation for the house of my God､ the gold for the gold､ and the silver for the silver､ and the bronze for the bronze､ the iron for the iron, and the wood for the wood,—and beryl stones and settings､ stones coloured and particoloured､ and all manner of precious stones and stones of white marble､ in abundance.
content_old: 2 And with all my might have I made preparation for the house of my God､ the gold for the gold､ and the silver for the silver､ and the bronze for the bronze､ the iron for the iron, and the wood for the wood,—and beryl stones and settings､ stones coloured and particoloured､ and all manner of precious stones and stones of white marble､ in abundance.

content: 3 And yet further because of my delighting in the house of my God, having a treasure of mine own in gold and silver I have given for the house of my God､ above and beyond all that I have prepared for the holy house:
content_old: 3 And yet further because of my delighting in the house of my God, having a treasure of mine own in gold and silver I have given for the house of my God､ above and beyond all that I have prepared for the holy house:

content: 4 three thousand talents of gold､ of the gold of Ophir,—and seven thousand talents of refined silver, for overlaying the walls of the recesses.
content_old: 4 three thousand talents of gold､ of the gold of Ophir,—and seven thousand talents of refined silver, for overlaying the walls of the recesses.

content: 5 Of gold for the gold､ and of silver for the silver, and for all manner of work in the hand of artificers,—Who then is ready to offer willingly, by filling his hand to-day､ unto Yahweh?
content_old: 5 Of gold for the gold､ and of silver for the silver, and for all manner of work in the hand of artificers,—Who then is ready to offer willingly, by filling his hand to-day､ unto Yahweh?

content: 6 Then offered they willingly—the ancestral rulers and the rulers of the tribes of Israel､ and the rulers of thousands and hundreds, even to the rulers of the work of the king;
content_old: 6 Then offered they willingly—the ancestral rulers and the rulers of the tribes of Israel､ and the rulers of thousands and hundreds, even to the rulers of the work of the king;

content: 7 and gave for the service of the house of God､ of gold five thousand talents and ten thousand drams, and of silver ten thousand talents, and of bronze eighteen thousand talents,—and of iron one hundred thousand talents.
content_old: 7 and gave for the service of the house of God､ of gold five thousand talents and ten thousand drams, and of silver ten thousand talents, and of bronze eighteen thousand talents,—and of iron one hundred thousand talents.

content: 8 And every one with whom were found precious stones gave to the treasure of the house of Yahweh,—unto the hand of Jehiel the Gershonite.
content_old: 8 And every one with whom were found precious stones gave to the treasure of the house of Yahweh,—unto the hand of Jehiel the Gershonite.

content: 9 So the people rejoiced because they willingly offered, for with a perfect heart offered they willingly unto Yahweh,—moreover also David the king rejoiced with great joy.
content_old: 9 So the people rejoiced because they willingly offered, for with a perfect heart offered they willingly unto Yahweh,—moreover also David the king rejoiced with great joy.

content: 10 Therefore did David bless Yahweh in the eyes of all the convocation,—and David said､ Blessed art thou､ O Yahweh､ the God of Israel our father, from age even unto age.
content_old: 10 Therefore did David bless Yahweh in the eyes of all the convocation,—and David said､ Blessed art thou､ O Yahweh､ the God of Israel our father, from age even unto age.

content: 11 Thine O Yahweh､ are Greatness､ and Might､ and Beauty､ and Victory､ and Majesty, nay! all in the heavens and in the earth,—thine O Yahweh､ is the kingdom, who art exalted above all—as chief;
content_old: 11 Thine O Yahweh､ are Greatness､ and Might､ and Beauty､ and Victory､ and Majesty, nay! all in the heavens and in the earth,—thine O Yahweh､ is the kingdom, who art exalted above all—as chief;

content: 12 and riches and honour are from before thee, and thou art ruling over all, and in thy hand are power and might,—and in thy hand it is, to give greatness and strength unto any.
content_old: 12 and riches and honour are from before thee, and thou art ruling over all, and in thy hand are power and might,—and in thy hand it is, to give greatness and strength unto any.

content: 13 Now therefore､ O our God, we are giving thanks unto thee,—and offering praise､ unto thy beautiful Name.
content_old: 13 Now therefore､ O our God, we are giving thanks unto thee,—and offering praise､ unto thy beautiful Name.

content: 14 And yet､ who am I､ and who are my people, that we should be able to offer willingly like this? for from thee is the whole, and out of thine own hand have we given unto thee;
content_old: 14 And yet､ who am I､ and who are my people, that we should be able to offer willingly like this? for from thee is the whole, and out of thine own hand have we given unto thee;

content: 15 for sojourners are we before thee､ and strangers､ like all our fathers,—like a shadow are our days upon the earth､ and there is no hope.
content_old: 15 for sojourners are we before thee､ and strangers､ like all our fathers,—like a shadow are our days upon the earth､ and there is no hope.

content: 16 O Yahweh our God, all this abundance which we have prepared, to build thee a house for thy holy Name out of thine own hand it is､ and thine is the whole.
content_old: 16 O Yahweh our God, all this abundance which we have prepared, to build thee a house for thy holy Name out of thine own hand it is､ and thine is the whole.

content: 17 But I know､ O my God, that thou art proving the heart, and with uprightness wilt thou be pleased,—I in the uprightness of my heart have willingly offered all these things, now therefore､ thy people who are found here have I seen with joy､ offering willingly unto thee.
content_old: 17 But I know､ O my God, that thou art proving the heart, and with uprightness wilt thou be pleased,—I in the uprightness of my heart have willingly offered all these things, now therefore､ thy people who are found here have I seen with joy､ offering willingly unto thee.

content: 18 O Yahweh､ God of Abraham､ Isaac､ and Israel､ our fathers, oh guard this age-abidingly, as the devised purpose of the heart of thy people,—and establish thou their heart､ unto thyself.
content_old: 18 O Yahweh､ God of Abraham､ Isaac､ and Israel､ our fathers, oh guard this age-abidingly, as the devised purpose of the heart of thy people,—and establish thou their heart､ unto thyself.

content: 19 Also unto Solomon my son give thou an undivided heart, to keep thy commandments､ thy testimonies､ and thy statutes,—to do the whole, and to build the palace for which I have prepared.
content_old: 19 Also unto Solomon my son give thou an undivided heart, to keep thy commandments､ thy testimonies､ and thy statutes,—to do the whole, and to build the palace for which I have prepared.

content: 20 Then said David､ unto all the convocation, Bless､ I beseech you､ Yahweh your God. So all the convocation blessed Yahweh､ the God of their fathers, and did bend their heads and bow themselves down unto Yahweh､ and unto the king;
content_old: 20 Then said David､ unto all the convocation, Bless､ I beseech you､ Yahweh your God. So all the convocation blessed Yahweh､ the God of their fathers, and did bend their heads and bow themselves down unto Yahweh､ and unto the king;

content: 21 and sacrificed unto Yahweh sacrifices､ and caused to go up ascending-offerings unto Yahweh､ on the morrow of that day, a thousand bullocks､ a thousand rams､ a thousand young sheep､ and the drink-offerings thereof,—and sacrifices in abundance､ for all Israel.
content_old: 21 and sacrificed unto Yahweh sacrifices､ and caused to go up ascending-offerings unto Yahweh､ on the morrow of that day, a thousand bullocks､ a thousand rams､ a thousand young sheep､ and the drink-offerings thereof,—and sacrifices in abundance､ for all Israel.

content: 22 And so they did eat and drink before Yahweh on that day､ with great joy,—and they､ the second time､ made Solomon son of David king, and anointed him unto Yahweh to be chief ruler､ and Zadok to be priest.
content_old: 22 And so they did eat and drink before Yahweh on that day､ with great joy,—and they､ the second time､ made Solomon son of David king, and anointed him unto Yahweh to be chief ruler､ and Zadok to be priest.

content: 23 So Solomon took his seat upon the throne of Yahweh､ as king､ instead of David his father､ and prospered,—and all Israel hearkened unto him.
content_old: 23 So Solomon took his seat upon the throne of Yahweh､ as king､ instead of David his father､ and prospered,—and all Israel hearkened unto him.

content: 24 And all the rulers､ and the heroes, yea moreover all the sons of King David gave a hand, under Solomon the king.
content_old: 24 And all the rulers､ and the heroes, yea moreover all the sons of King David gave a hand, under Solomon the king.

content: 25 And Yahweh magnified Solomon､ exceedingly, before the eyes of all Israel,—and gave unto him a royal majesty, that had not been on any king before him､ over Israel.
content_old: 25 And Yahweh magnified Solomon､ exceedingly, before the eyes of all Israel,—and gave unto him a royal majesty, that had not been on any king before him､ over Israel.

content: 26 Thus David son of Jesse reigned over all Israel;
content_old: 26 Thus David son of Jesse reigned over all Israel;

content: 27 and the days that he reigned over Israel were forty years,—in Hebron reigned he seven years, and in Jerusalem reigned he､ thirty-three.
content_old: 27 and the days that he reigned over Israel were forty years,—in Hebron reigned he seven years, and in Jerusalem reigned he､ thirty-three.

content: 28 And he died in a good old age, satisfied with days､ riches and honour,—and Solomon his son reigned in his stead.
content_old: 28 And he died in a good old age, satisfied with days､ riches and honour,—and Solomon his son reigned in his stead.

content: 29 Now the acts of David the king, first and last behold them! written in the records of Samuel the seer, and in the records of Nathan the prophet, and in the records of Gad the seer:
content_old: 29 Now the acts of David the king, first and last behold them! written in the records of Samuel the seer, and in the records of Nathan the prophet, and in the records of Gad the seer:
